name: Suction Machine
description: Removes fluids like mucus from the airway. Essential for patients with respiratory issues.

name: Trach Strap
description: Secures a tracheostomy tube comfortably. Prevents accidental displacement during use.

name: Nebulizer
description: Delivers medication directly to lungs in mist form. Ideal for asthma and COPD treatment.

name: Feeding burette
description: Used to administer accurate fluid volumes intravenously. Crucial in pediatric and critical care.

name: Alcohol Swab
description: Sterile pad with alcohol for skin disinfection. Used before injections or procedures.

name: Suprasorb P Non Adhesive
description: Soft foam dressing for wound management. Absorbs exudate while preventing adhesion.

name: Hand sanitizer
description: Alcohol-based gel for hand hygiene. Reduces microbial presence without water.

name: NaCl
description: Sterile saline solution for irrigation or IV use. Maintains fluid and electrolyte balance.

name: HME
description: Heat and moisture exchanger for ventilators. Helps retain warmth and humidity in breathing circuits.

name: Mask
description: Protective face covering against airborne particles. Used in surgeries and general care.

name: Scissors
description: Used for cutting dressings, sutures or tissue. Precision instrument for clinical use.

name: Syringe with needle
description: Device for injecting medications or drawing fluids. Common in all medical settings.

name: Cotton Swab Sterile
description: Used for wound cleaning and sample collection. Sterile and disposable for hygiene.

name: Hygrometer
description: Measures humidity in the environment. Helps monitor optimal conditions for care.

name: Battery
description: Power source for portable medical equipment. Ensures uninterrupted operation during use.

name: Biohazard Container
description: Safe disposal container for infectious waste. Prevents contamination and infection spread.

name: Sterile Gauze
description: Used to cover and protect wounds. Absorbs exudate and prevents infection.

name: Suction Connection Tube
description: Connects suction equipment to patients. Ensures effective airway clearance.

name: Oxygen Tank
description: Stores and supplies oxygen for patients. Critical for respiratory emergencies and care.

name: Ventilator
description: Supports or replaces spontaneous breathing. Used in intensive and critical care units.

name: Oximeter
description: Measures blood oxygen saturation and pulse rate. Non-invasive and quick monitoring tool.

name: Micropore
description: Breathable adhesive tape for dressings. Gentle on skin and secure for long wear.

name: Trach Vent T
description: Tracheostomy accessory for humidified oxygen delivery. Enhances patient comfort.

name: Hypafix
description: Secure dressing fixation adhesive. Conforms to body contours for patient mobility.

name: Mucus Extractor
description: Removes mucus from airways in infants. Ensures clear breathing and comfort.

name: Lubricant Gel
description: Water-soluble gel for medical instrument insertion. Reduces friction and irritation.

name: Vaseline
description: Petroleum jelly for skin protection. Prevents dryness and irritation in patients.

name: Underpad
description: Absorbent sheet placed under patients. Protects bedding and surfaces from fluids.

name: Trach Portex Size 6
description: Tracheostomy tube of size 6 for airway access. Designed for long-term use.

name: Trach Portex Size 7.5
description: Size 7.5 tracheostomy tube for airway management. Ensures optimal ventilation.

name: NGT Silicone Feeding Tube
description: Flexible tube for enteral feeding. Ideal for long-term nutritional support.

name: NGT Non Silicone Feeding Tube
description: Non-silicone variant for short-term feeding. Cost-effective and disposable.

name: Syringe without Needle 1 CC (50 PC)
description: Used to deliver precise medication dosages. Needle-free for versatility.

name: Syringe without Needle 1 CC (100 PC)
description: Bulk pack for repetitive clinical use. Ensures sterile administration.

name: Syringe without Needle 3 CC (100 PC)
description: 3ml volume for multiple uses. Ideal for drawing or dispensing liquids.

name: Syringe without Needle 5 CC (100 PC)
description: 5ml syringe for accurate dosing. Widely used in hospitals and labs.

name: Syringe without Needle 20 CC (50 PC)
description: 20ml syringe without needle for large volume meds. Used in IV and irrigation.

name: Syringe without Needle 50 CC
description: 50ml syringe for high volume procedures. Ideal for wound irrigation.

name: Syringe without Needle 100 CC
description: High-capacity syringe for fluid removal or transfer. Durable and clear.

name: Syringe with needle 1 CC
description: Small capacity syringe with needle. Used in vaccinations and pediatric care.

name: Syringe with needle 100 CC
description: High-capacity syringe with needle. Designed for large fluid administration.

name: Syringe with needle 3 CC
description: Most common size for injections. Balanced for accuracy and ease of use.

name: Syringe with needle 5 CC
description: Mid-range capacity syringe with needle. Suitable for intramuscular injections.

name: Syringe with needle 10 CC
description: Used for fluid extraction or medicine injection. Provides larger dose options.

name: Suction Catheter
description: Flexible tube for airway suctioning. Helps in secretion removal and ventilation.

name: Ambu Bag Infants
description: Manual resuscitator for infants. Used in emergency respiratory support.

name: Ambu Bag Pediatrics
description: Hand-held device for ventilating pediatric patients. Ensures oxygenation in crises.

name: Ambu Bag Adults
description: Resuscitation device for adults. Delivers breaths manually in emergency situations.

name: Mucus Extractor 8
description: Size 8 mucus extractor for infants. Clears airways during suctioning.

name: Mucus Extractor 10
description: Medium-sized extractor for safe suction. Ensures comfort and hygiene.

name: Mucus Extractor 14
description: Larger extractor for effective suctioning. Suitable for older children or adults.
